definition: old man/I (an old man referring to himself)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: Originally took aim at Chiang old man's wallet.
sentences.chinese: 原来是瞄上了蒋老汉的钱包。

sentences.english: The house being built belongs to that old man who is smoking over there .
sentences.chinese: 那所正被造的房子属于那边在抽烟的那位老汉。

sentences.english: Prudhomme and Fouillou. Paris alone has this in its natural history.
sentences.chinese: 这是呆老汉和淘哥儿，只在巴黎的自然史中才会有。

sentences.english: The old man is sleeping in a hammock hanging between two trees.
sentences.chinese: 那老汉正睡在两棵树之间的一个吊床上。

sentences.english: Her mother looked, is a sixty year old man with dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她循声望去，是一个六十多岁皮肤黝黑的老汉。

sentences.english: The old man is always carrying a tobacco pouch with him.
sentences.chinese: 这老汉总是随身带著烟袋。

sentences.english: An old man suffered hard of hearing because of old age, so his son bought him a hearing aid.
sentences.chinese: 一老汉年高耳背，儿子便给他买了一个助听器。

sentences.english: A man of eighty was picking up lumps of coal along the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 一个年过八旬的老汉，这会儿正沿着铁路在捡煤碴。

sentences.english: Said the old man, pointing at the hillside behind him.
sentences.chinese: 老汉指着身后的山坡笑呵呵地说。

sentences.english: Paris alone has this in its natural history.
sentences.chinese: 这是呆老汉和淘哥儿，只在巴黎的自然史中才会有。

sentences.english: Jobs were hard to find in Yaoba, and she thought of her father, who know how to make umbrellas.
sentences.chinese: 尧坝不好找工作，秀嫂想起了会做伞的老汉儿。

sentences.english: The old man leaned against the wall, bewailing his misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 老汉靠在墙上，哀叹自己的不幸。

sentences.english: A Chinese man eats a snack outside a food shop in Beijing, China. (March 22, 2011) (Andy Wong/Associated Press)
sentences.chinese: 北京，一个老汉在小吃店外面吃点心。

sentences.english: The old man asked if he would taste his drink and tell him the AGE.
sentences.chinese: 老汉问他能否品品他的饮料，然后告诉他是几年的。

sentences.english: The old man is selling sirupy calabashes.
sentences.chinese: 河南洛阳卖糖葫芦的老汉。

definition: (coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
arrogant idler/self-centered show-off
uncle/grandpa/CL:位[wei4]
old lady
(coll.) father's older brother's wife/aunt (polite address)
old lady/Madam (polite address)/CL:位[wei4]
elderly lady (respectful)/esteemed mother/CL:位[wei4]
see 老頭子|老头子[lao3 tou2 zi5]
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
old fellow/old man/father/husband
(of an elderly couple) husband or wife
old lady (term of modesty)
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
great-grandmother
eldest of father's younger brothers/uncle (term used to address a man about the age of one's father)
